briefdescription.para: Set the pins to be used by the nRF21540 (Front End Module - FEM)

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a struct containing the pins

briefdescription.para: Enable VREGRADIO.VREQH in NET core for getting extra TX power.

simplesect.para: If the nRF21540 is not used, setting max_tx_power to 10 or 20 will result in +3dBm
This can be used to set a public address for the device Note that bt_setup_public_id_addr(void) should be called after this function to properly set the address.

parameterdescription.para: The target bit in operation mode flag
TX power setting for the advertising. Please check ble_hci_vs_tx_power for possible settings

briefdescription.para: Set TX power for specific connection.

parameterdescription.para: Specific connection handle for TX power setting
TX power setting for the specific connection handle Please check ble_hci_vs_tx_power for possible settings

briefdescription.para: Set the maximum transmit power on primary advertising channels.

parameterdescription.para: TX power setting for the primary advertising channels in advertising extension, which are BLE channel 37, 38 and 39 Please check ble_hci_vs_tx_power for possible settings Set to BLE_HCI_VSC_PRI_EXT_ADV_MAX_TX_PWR_DISABLE (-127) for disabling this feature

memberdef.argsstring: (enum ble_hci_vs_led_function_id id, enum ble_hci_vs_led_function_mode mode, uint16_t pin)
memberdef.name: ble_hci_vsc_led_pin_map

briefdescription.para: Map LED pin to a specific controller function.

parameterdescription.para: Describes the LED function Please check ble_hci_vs_led_function_id for possible IDs
Describes how the pin is toggled Please check ble_hci_vs_led_function_mode for possible modes
